title: Mean pulmonary artery pressure prediction with explainable multi-view cardiac MR cine series deep learning model
details: LH Cheng, X Sun, C Elliot, R Condliffe, DG Kiely… - Journal of Cardiovascular …
abstract: Background Pulmonary hypertension (PH) is a heterogeneous condition and regardless of aetiology impacts negatively on survival. Diagnosis of PH is based on hemodynamic parameters measured invasively at right heart catheterization (RHC) …
